column3: ACK, could you also update the help text, so that this is not only shown on error?
@MarcoFalke it's already in the help text : \nhttps://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/c59e3a32614e627ba2834b032d4799eb69672155/src/rpc/rawtransaction.cpp#L78-L80
No strong opinion, but generally I think error messages shouldn't mention arguments or configurations, for that we have the help message.
Is that really a guideline? This seems very helpful, especially as the underlying API changes(no more UTXO lookup)

For cli usage this might be useful, but for the developer what really matters IMO is the documentation and error code in the response.\n\nI understand the issue regarding the API change, but I'd rather see a documentation improvement than having "hints" in the errors.
